field.name: TEXT域
field.common: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <@htmlTag.text name="${name}" value="${value?if_exists}" accesskey="${accesskey?if_exists}" alt="${alt?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" oncontextmenu="${oncontextmenu?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" styleClass="${styleClass?if_exists}" styleId="${styleId?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" maxlength="${maxlength?if_exists}" ></@htmlTag.text>${notnull?if_exists}

field.name: TEXTAREA域
field.common: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <@htmlTag.textarea name="${name}" value="${value?if_exists}" rows="${rows?if_exists}" cols="${cols?if_exists}" accesskey="${accesskey?if_exists}" alt="${alt?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" styleClass="${styleClass?if_exists}" styleId="${styleId?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" beanName="${beanName?if_exists}" property="${property?if_exists}" ></@htmlTag.textarea>${notnull?if_exists}

field.name: RADIO域
field.common: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <@htmlTag.radio name="${name}" value="${lv.key}" property="${property?if_exists}" accesskey="${accesskey?if_exists}" alt="${alt?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" styleClass="${styleClass?if_exists}" styleId="${styleId?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" >${lv.value}</@htmlTag.radio> </#list>${notnull?if_exists}
field.hidden-edit: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> </#if> <#list list as lv> <#if lv.key==checkValue> <@htmlTag.hidden name="${name}" value="${value}"> </#if> >${lv.value} </#list>
field.readonly-edit: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <#if lv.key==checkValue> ${displayValue} <@htmlTag.hidden name="${name}" value="${value}"> >${lv.value}

field.name: CHECKBOX域
field.common: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <#assign isChecked=false> <#assign propertyValue=""> <#list list1 as lvv> <#if lv.key==lvv.value> <#assign isChecked=true> <#assign propertyValue=lvv.key> </#if> </#list> <#if isChecked==true> <@htmlTag.checkbox name="${name}" value="${lv.key}" property="${propertyValue}" accesskey="${accesskey?if_exists}" alt="${alt?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" styleClass="${styleClass?if_exists}" styleId="${styleId?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" >${lv.value} </@htmlTag.checkbox> <#elseif isChecked==false> <@htmlTag.checkbox name="${name}" value="${lv.key}" property="${propertyValue}" accesskey="${accesskey?if_exists}" alt="${alt?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" styleClass="${styleClass?if_exists}" styleId="${styleId?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" >${lv.value} </@htmlTag.checkbox> </#if> </#list>
field.readonly: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <#list list1 as lv1> <#if lv.key==lv1.value> ${lv.value}
field.hidden-edit: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <#list list1 as lv1> <#if lv.key==lv1.value> <@htmlTag.hidden name="${name}" value="${lv.key}"></@htmlTag.hidden> </#if> </#list> </#list>
field.readonly-edit: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <#list list1 as lv1> <#if lv.key==lv1.value> ${lv.value} <@htmlTag.hidden name="${name}" value="${lv.key}">

field.name: 下拉选择
field.common: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <@htmlTag.select name="${name}" property="${property?if_exists}" size="${sizeValue?if_exists}" alt="${alt?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" value="${value?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" > <#list list as lv> <option value="${lv.key}" ${lv.selected?if_exists}>${lv.value}</option> </#list> </@htmlTag.select>
field.hidden-edit: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <#if lv.selected=="selected"> <@htmlTag.hidden name="${name}" value="${lv.key}"></@htmlTag.hidden> </#if> </#list>
field.readonly-edit: <#assign htmlTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-html.tld"]> <#list list as lv> <#if lv.selected=="selected"> ${lv.value} <@htmlTag.hidden name="${name}" value="${lv.key}">

field.name: 日期时间域
field.common: <#assign dateTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-date.tld"]> <@dateTag.date name="${name}" divname="${divname}" value="${value?if_exists}" maxYear="${maxYear?if_exists}" hastime="true" position="${position?if_exists}" minYear="${minYear?if_exists}" zindex="${zindex?if_exists}" sourceFormat="${sourceFormat?if_exists}" targetFormat="${targetFormat?if_exists}" property="${property?if_exists}" accesskey="${accesskey?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" styleClass="${styleClass?if_exists}" styleId="${styleId?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" > </@dateTag.date>

field.name: 日期域
field.common: <#assign dateTag=JspTaglibs["/WEB-INF/tlds/web-date.tld"]> <@dateTag.date name="${name}" divname="${divname}" value="${value?if_exists}" position="${position?if_exists}" maxYear="${maxYear?if_exists}" minYear="${minYear?if_exists}" zindex="${zindex?if_exists}" property="${property?if_exists}" accesskey="${accesskey?if_exists}" title="${title?if_exists}" onblur="${onblur?if_exists}" onchange="${onchange?if_exists}" onclick="${onclick?if_exists}" ondblclick="${ondblclick?if_exists}" onfocus="${onfocus?if_exists}" onkeydown="${onkeydown?if_exists}" onkeypress="${onkeypress?if_exists}" onkeyup="${onkeyup?if_exists}" onmousedown="${onmousedown?if_exists}" onmousemove="${onmousemove?if_exists}" onmouseout="${onmouseout?if_exists}" onmouseover="${onmouseover?if_exists}" onmouseup="${onmouseup?if_exists}" style="${style?if_exists}" styleClass="${styleClass?if_exists}" styleId="${styleId?if_exists}" tabindex="${tabindex?if_exists}" > </@dateTag.date>
